Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.CardRelated

Class FlippablePlayableCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.CardRelated.CardGUI
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.CardRelated.FlippableCardGUI
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.CardRelated.FlippablePlayableCard
public class FlippablePlayableCard extends FlippableCardGUI
This class represents a card that can be flipped by the player and that can be placed in the codex
